description: TEHRAN – Esteghlal football team, the most decorated team in Iran’s Hazfi Cup, were knocked out of the competition in the 2023/24 edition after losing to Mes in Rafsanjan 2-0 on Monday.
title: Esteghlal out of Iran’s Hazfi Cup, Persepolis, Sepahan victorious

description: TEHRAN - On October 28, 2023, an article titled "The Humiliation of International Law" was penned by me for the Tehran Times. However, witnessing South Africa initiate proceedings against the Zionist regime on December 29, 2023, regarding violations of the Genocide Convention in the Gaza Strip at the International Court of Justice (ICJ/ Court), my perspective shifted.
title: International Court of Justice, ha-ha

description: The Lebanese Hezbollah resistance movement has warned that any Israeli act of aggression against the country would ignite an advanced version of the 33-day war fought back in the summer of 2006, when the occupying regime suffered a humiliating defeat.
title: Hezbollah: Israeli attack on Lebanon will ignite new version of 2006 war

description: The Israeli Broadcasting Authority (KAN) aired audio late Sunday of two of three Israeli captives in Gaza who were accidentally killed by the Israeli army in December last year as they pleaded to be rescued.
title: Israeli captives in Gaza call for help before being killed by the regime’s army

description: Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the head of the World Health Organization, said on X that the UN body has visited al-Awda and Kamal Adwan hospitals in northern Gaza over the weekend.
title: WHO chief shares ‘grim findings’ after visits to north Gaza hospitals

description: The number of Palestinian children who died due to malnutrition and lack of treatment had risen to 16, medical sources confirmed on Monday, shortly after the death of a child in Abu Youssef Al-Najjar Hospital in Rafah.
title: More Gaza kids dying from malnutrition

description:
UN human rights chief Volker Turk has likened the Gaza war to a “powder keg” with the potential to spark broader conflict in West Asia. 
Turk said it was imperative to do everything possible to avoid a wider conflagration, Al Arabiya reported.
title: UN: Gaza ‘powder keg’ could spark wider war

description: Germany accused Russia on Monday of leaking an intercepted recording of German military discussions about how to support Ukraine in an attempt to divide Europe.
title: Germany accuses Russia of seeking to divide Europe with leaked call

description: TEHRAN- “The House in the Pines” by American author Ana Reyes has recently been published in Persian.
title: “The House in the Pines” appears in Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN-The 13th Tehran International Animation Festival (TIAF) kicked off on Sunday at the Cultural and Artistic Creations Center of the Institute for the Intellectual Development of Children and Young Adults (Kanoon) in Tehran.
title: 13th Tehran International Animation Festival kicks off

description: TEHRAN - In an official statement, the Iranian president extended warm congratulations to Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on his recent election as the new Prime Minister of Pakistan.
title: Iranian president congratulates new Pakistani PM, affirms bilateral commitment

description: TEHRAN - In a note, the Iran newspaper addressed the lies of the opposition about the flood of Sistan and Baluchestan and wrote: The Iranian opposition started falsifying and making lies again.
title: The lies of anti-revolution about the flood of Sistan and Baluchestan

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi asserted the armed force's indispensable role at the core of the country on Monday.
title: Iran president lauds armed forces as ‘pride of the nation’

description: TEHRAN- The prime minister of Iraq has expressed gratitude to Iran for supporting his nation in its battle against the terrorist group Daesh, citing several areas of shared interest between the two countries.
title: Iraqi PM commends Tehran for supporting Baghdad in war with Daesh

description: TEHRAN- Interior Minister Ahmad Vahidi has revealed that the turnout for the March 1 elections stood at 41%, with approximately 25 million individuals participating, including a 5% count of blank votes.
title: Interior Ministry discloses 41% voter turnout in March 1 elections

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian Army Navy's 212 helicopters have been outfitted with sonar and Qaem 114 missiles, as reported by Tasnim on Monday.
title: Army's 212 helicopters equipped with sonar technology and Qaem 114 missiles

description: TEHRAN - Rafael Grossi, the Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), has once again called on Iran to fully cooperate with the agency despite Iran’s continued cooperation.
title: IAEA Director urges Iran's full cooperation amidst alleged concerns

description: TEHRAN- Ali al-Sadiq Ali, Sudan’s Foreign Minister, has refuted claims by Western media on Iran's endeavor to create a permanent naval base on the nation's Red Sea coast in Northeast Africa.
title: Sudan denies WSJ report on Iran trying to build naval station in Red Sea

description: TEHRAN - Iranian Defense Minister Mohammad Reza Ashtiani is visiting Doha, the capital of Qatar, to hold talks with top Qatari defense and military officials and visit the Doha International Maritime Defence Exhibition and Conference (DIMDEX).
title: Iran, Qatar hold defense talks at DIMDEX expo in Doha

description: Nikki Haley has defeated Donald Trump in the Republican primary in Washington DC.
title: Haley beats Trump in Washington DC

description: TEHRAN - Reports that have surfaced on the large number of American citizens killed while fighting for the Israeli regime in its genocidal war against the people of Gaza have raised controversy.
title: American nationals killed fighting in Gaza

description: TEHRAN- Cracks are further widening within the Israeli wartime leadership throwing a spotlight on the regime’s failed policy toward the war on Gaza.
title: “Subversive Trojan horse” in Washington

description: TEHRAN- Comic books have long been a source of humor and entertainment for children and some adults. However, some journalists and cartoonists have tried to express serious and sometimes tragic issues, diverging from the dominance of vibrant superheroes and cheerful content, leading to the emergence of comic journals. These artists are using their medium to address important world issues and shed light on human suffering.
title: Uncovering the untold tragic truths of Palestine through graphic novels

description: TEHRAN- The spokesman for Iran's Foreign Ministry has emphasized the significance of the Organization of Islamic Cooperation's (OIC) impending emergency meeting, stating that the 57-member group is "facing a test" over Israel's genocide in the Gaza Strip.
title: OIC will face ‘litmus test’ over U.S. backing for Israel aggressive war crimes: Iran

description: TEHRAN - Western-based social media platforms like Facebook have been positioning themselves as innocuous and neutral platforms that at times get misused and taken advantage of by malicious users.
title: Meta: An extension of Western governments

description: TEHRAN – A familiarization tour has been planned to improve the status of eco-lodges in Fars province.
title: Fam tour to promote eco-lodges in Fars province

description: TEHRAN – In preparation for the upcoming Persian New Year (Nowruz) holidays, Ilam’s director-general of tourism has announced the readiness of 264 accommodation centers with a total capacity of 5,331 guests to host travelers and tourists around the clock.
title: Persian New Year: Ilam gears up with 264 hospitality centers

description: TEHRAN – On Monday, Ilam’s tourism chief announced the registration of four historical relics from the western Iranian province on the national list of cultural heritage.
title: Elamite engraved bricks made national heritage

description: TEHRAN - Step into a world where tradition meets vibrancy, where every thread tells a tale of heritage and identity.
title: Welcome to captivating realm of nomadic wear

description: TEHRAN – Iran has set its sights on attracting millions of Chinese nationals as part of its strategy to boost the tourism industry.
title: Iran aims to attract millions of Chinese vacationers

description: TEHRAN- Iran exported commodities valued at $11.5 billion to China during the first ten months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-January 20, 2024), the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) announced.
title: Iran exports goods worth $11.5b to China in 10 months

description: TEHRAN- As announced by a provincial official, 199,983 tons of products worth $77.019 million were exported from North Khorasan province, in the northeast of Iran, during the first 10 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-January 20, 2024).
title: Commodities worth over $77m exported from North Khorasan in 10 months
OIC ‘litmus test’ for supporting Palestine

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), dropped 6,913 points (0.32 percent) to 2,140,174 on Monday, which is the third day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX falls 6,000 points on Monday

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Oil Minister Javad Oji and Algeria’s Minister of Energy and Mines, Mohamed Arkab signed a document to cooperate in the oil and gas sector in the Algerian capital Algiers on Sunday.
title: Iran, Algeria sign energy cooperation document

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Ambassador in Tashkent met with the Minister of Energy of Uzbekistan and both sides emphasized strengthening relations in various economic sectors.
title: Tehran, Tashkent discuss ways of boosting economic ties

description: TEHRAN - Afghanistan’s ruling government has called for opening an economic representative office in Iran’s southeastern port of Chabahar, IRNA reported.
title: Afghanistan calls for opening economic office in Chabahar Port

description: TEHRAN - Abadan oil refinery, the largest in Iran, has reported an increase in processing capacity in line with the Oil Ministry’s new policy to slash the export of crude oil.
title: Iran’s largest oil refinery reports increase in processing capacity

description: TEHRAN - Water inflow to Iran’s dams has decreased by 12 percent since the beginning of the current water year (September 23, 2023) up to March 2, 2024, compared to the same period last year, the new report released by the Water Resources Management Company shows.
title: Water inflow to dam reserves declines 12%

description: TEHRAN - The Head of Iran Small Industries and Industrial Parks Organization (ISIPO) Farshad Moghimi has expressed the country’s readiness for the expansion of economic and industrial cooperation with Zimbabwe.
title: Tehran, Harare mull over expansion of industrial co-op

description: TEHRAN - Iran and Ghana have signed a document on cooperation in the field of air transportation.
title: Iran, Ghana sign document on air transport cooperation

description: Sometimes I feel so disappointed that I wonder for whom I am writing and what my role as an intellectual is towards the masses.  We indeed live in a brutal and unprecedented time of selfishness and over-representation, where smart technologies, in their smart form, have been able to effectively be a focus of attraction for everyone, exercising all forms of domination, control and control over them.  However, we actually live in an unreal reality in which the masses were able to create and shape their own space and society.  But what if everything is an illusion?
title: Artificial intelligence between illusion and delusion

description: TEHRAN –Despite a significant increase in rainfall over the past two weeks, the country is still facing a shortage of rainfall compared to normal conditions, according to the Metrological Organization.
title: Rainfall deficit persists despite increased precipitations

description: TEHRAN – The Department of Environment is planning to save the Euphrates turtle which has been classified as a critically endangered animal on the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) red list.
title: Euphrates turtle conservation on DOE’s agenda

description: TEHRAN – The Ministry of Health will provide services to patients who are suffering from hard-to-treat and rare diseases during the Noruz (New Year) holidays, starting March 21.
title: Rare disease patients to receive services during Noruz holidays

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Aliakbar Gharibshahi and Hamed Solhipour claimed a gold and a silver medal, respectively at the 13th Fazza Dubai 2024 ParaPowerlifting World Cup.
title: Iranian powerlifters win two more medals at Fazza Dubai 2024 World Cup

description: TEHRAN – Iran water polo team defeated Malaysia 34-3 on Monday at the 11th Asian Age Group Championship.
title: Iran water polo start 11th Asian Age Group Championship in style

description: TEHRAN - The appointment of Mauricio Motta Paes as the head coach of the Iranian men's national volleyball team has elicited diverse reactions.
title: Volleyball federation forced to hire Mauricio Paes
